tgt_original: āśīrvādaparo nityameṣa [prājñaḥ] purohitaḥ ||9 ||  śabdaśāstraparijñātā eṣa lekhaka iṣyate ||10 ||  varṇāñchabdāṃśca yo vetti śabdatattvavicakṣaṇaḥ |  vidheyaḥ pāṭhako hyeva gandharvaḥ svaravidyathā ||11 ||

src_original: apramādī pramāthī ca pratīhāraḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,112.6 //  medhāvī vākpaṭuḥ prājñaḥ satyavādī jitendriyaḥ /
tgt_original: śubhāśubhaphalābhijño dhīraḥ prājño jitandriyaḥ |  daṇḍādhikārikaḥ śuddho nṛpasya deharakṣakaḥ ||12 ||

src_original: sarvaśāstrasamālokī hyeṣa sādhuḥ sa lekhakaḥ // GarP_1,112.7 //
tgt_original: āyurvedakṛtābhyāsaḥ sarveṣāṃ priyadarśanaḥ |  [śīlavidhiṣu sampanno ] vaidyo eṣa vidhīyate ||13 ||

src_original: buddhimānmatimāṃścaiva paracittopalakṣakaḥ /  krūro yathoktavādī ca eṣa dūto vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.8 //  samastasmṛtiśāstrajñaḥ paṇḍito 'tha jitendriyaḥ /
tgt_original: balavānmadhuvaktaścā 'parāñjānāti yo laghu |  parāśayasadābhijño vidheyaḥ pālakaḥ sadā ||14 ||

src_original: śauryavīryaguṇopeto dharmādhyakṣo vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.9 //  pitṛpaitāmaho dakṣaḥ śāstrajñaḥ satyavācakaḥ /  śuciśca kaṭhinaścaiva sūpakāraḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,112.10 //
tgt_original: śastreṣu kuśalī dakṣo vāhaneṣu suśikṣakaḥ |  dhairya vīryaguṇopetaḥ senādhyakṣo vidhīyate ||15 ||
